short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a repository's .github/replies.yml to GitHub's Saved Replies feature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Saved Replies are great, but oftentimes repository maintainers need a way to share common replies per-repository.
This extension modifies the Saved Replies for issues and pull requests on any repository with a .github/replies.yml file to include those replies.

Note: for this extension to do anything, you must be logged into GitHub and viewing an issue or pull request on a repository that includes a .github/replies.yml file. https://github.com/JoshuaKGoldberg/refined-saved-replies/issues is a good example! ðŸ˜‰
